thag1.7:5.1: He has swept away the army of the King of Death,
thag1.7:5.2: as a great flood, a fragile bridge of reeds.
thag1.7:5.3: Victorious since his fears have vanished:
thag1.7:5.4: tame and steadfast, he has become extinguished.
thag1.7:6.1: It was thus that this verse was recited by the senior venerable Bhalliya.
